snippet: A number of travel sites will help you get money back if the price of a room or flight drops after you reserve. So which one is right for you? Here’s a guide to three of the sites.
abstract: Michelle Higgins Practical Traveler column on travel sites that will help travelers receive refunds if the price of a hotel room or flight drops after a reservation has been made.
lead_paragraph: A number of travel sites will help you get money back if the price of a room or flight drops after you reserve. So which one is right for you? Here’s a guide to three of the sites.
